website_summaries.verdict: A good pick if you prefer looks over performance, but others on our list do a better job filtering out light and noise.
pros: Insulated curtains that block out most sunlight
Available in a number of stylish colors
Grommets give them an expensive look, though the price is reasonable
cons: The lighter colors aren't as effective at room darkening
Some owners weren't happy with the noise filtering ability, and some received panels with uneven measurements and hemlines

customer_reviews.title: NOT BLACK OUT. NOT THERMAL INSULATED.
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are somewhat heavier material but they are definitely NOT blackout curtains. They are also NOT thermal insulated. My mistake was not reading the reviews and looking at customer photos. I looked at star score and bought bc I was in a rush and needed something quickly. They will be returned for blatant false advertising. Blackout curtains literally blackout a room bc it does not allow any light to enter thru the material of the curtains. The curtains usually have a special lining in order to do this. The lining also helps w heat/cooling. These curtains have no lining, do not block out light, do not stop heat from coming thru.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a big mistake
customer_reviews.text: 1)It is made in China. 2)I noticed that most of the people don't care about these reviews and don't know what is black out curtains. 3)I am very disappointed because i have ordered 10 panels turquoise and this is not black out curtains at all and the length and width are not fixed. 4)The dealer is a liar and i don't understand why Amazon accept dealers like that.(#5000good reviews!@#%&) 5)I know what i'm talking about and i don't need to have my mum advise to notice that ; even if she was a former seamstress>
customer_reviews.author: REY Y

customer_reviews.title: Fail at Reducing Noise
customer_reviews.text: Bough the curtain as a mean to reduce noise from the street. But it completely fails at this. I absolutely do not feel any sound reduction with it at all (or perhaps I had had high expectation after reading some positive review about its noise feature). The fabric is thick and smooth. It does an acceptable job at blocking out the light. Some light could pass through even with the blind closed ( I bough a turquoise color). 2x up the curtains can totally block out the light ( I do this hoping it would be better with noise reduction, but....) The blind is good with heat insulation ( keep in mind I double up the curtain)
customer_reviews.author: Snowflake05

customer_reviews.title: Nice Curtains, but not true to description
customer_reviews.text: 1. I bought these curtains to cover a glass wall and sliding door to my balcony. These do not cancel noise at all, I live in NYC, I can still hear sirens, car horns, etc. just as much without the curtains. 2. I bought two colors, greyish-white and navy blue. The grey-ish white is 100% NOT BLACKOUT. The "navy" blue is not navy. Definitely more of a royal blue and flecks of light peers through. 3. the promised 96" is untrue, they're 94". We measured it... final consensus - these curtains are for style, they do not cancel noise, block out light fully and the Navy Blue isn't true navy. I will post pics soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not manufactured well.
customer_reviews.text: Upon hanging the curtains we discovered that they were completely different lengths. I removed them from the rod and laid them flat to double check and surely enough curtains that came out of the same package (a set of 2) were at least an inch different in length. They are also much more lightweight than I would like for my blackout curtains to be. I prefer them to have a little heft so they don't blow around from the air coming out of the AC/heater vent.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: 100% BUY THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: SUPER LUXURIOUS feel! I am very impressed with quality for the price! They are heavy, soft, well made! I wasn't really expecting much for the price. I have been wanting to replace my curtains for a while but I just couldn't see spending so much for blackout curtains. I'm 100% thrilled I waited!! I'm seriously obsessed with the feel of these. I love the color. Deep rich color. Luxurious feel!! They took minimal effort to hang and look absolutely fabulous!! I absolutely recommend these!! The price in no way reflects the quality. Perhaps my favorite purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Juls

customer_reviews.title: Color not true and no free return
customer_reviews.text: We purchased "greyish white" curtains, but they look greyish blue, not white at all. Also, the fiber is like a microfiber- it catches on your skin. We are returning it, but have to pay for the return shipping. What a bummer- the product is not the color we expected and we have to pay to return it. I should have paid more attention to that when purchasing. Can't remember the last time I had to pay for return shipping on Amazon. Not happy at all. Other than the color, texture and financial loss, the curtains are fine- they have silver grommets, a straight hem, hang nicely and look like they'd block light.
customer_reviews.author: Shoes

customer_reviews.title: They're good curtains, and they block well without being big, heavy, thick or clumsy!
customer_reviews.text: Creases: 15-20 min in dryer on medium setting. Throw in 1-2 wet bath towels and the creases will be gone. Weight: These are not some thick, goofy, hard to move panels. They are airy, yet effective at light blocking. Temp control: Duh... they block light, so they reduce the temp in summer and in winter, they'd offer some light insulation against drafts, because they're curtains, and this is nothing new. A fine product for the price. Warning! If you have to cover 52-inch width, a 52 inch panel with this hanging style will fall short by 4 or 5 inches, because they will have a natural pleat when hung by the holes with a rod.
customer_reviews.author: Filandro

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! These photos were taken 5 minutes apart.
customer_reviews.text: Here I have included a before and after with the curtains I had, replaced by the new blackout curtains. First and foremost I want to share the fact that I probably have the most annoying neighbors on the planet and got these for 2 reasons. 1. To block out the sun light. 2. Cancel out noise. THEY WORKED FOR BOTH. To my surprise I assumed that they would only work for the sunlight at least. Once they were up and hanging, they actually muffle incoming noise. I love them. I will be purchasing more for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't about 90% of what it says
customer_reviews.text: I used this to darken out my den for controlling light in my multipurpose/home theater room. It works well at blocking out 95% of the light that I can consider my room 'light controlled' for my projector. in the day time. Not sure how much sound it blocks from entering my other rooms, but I would say, maybe 5%-10%? It came with wrinkles as the curtain was folded into a rectangle for packaging, but was able to steam it out with my clothes steamer (~10 minutes per panel) Either way, I'm happy about the purchase that I bought 3 more to blackout the 1 opened side wall of my den.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT black out curtains like it says in the description
customer_reviews.text: As you can see NOT blackout curtains even though the description clearly says Blackout Curtains enough light comes thought where if you put your hands up agains the curtain it feels hot. So in turn that’s hearing up your room just a little bit. Save your money. I only kept them cause this was the second time I returned and exchanged curtains. Don’t feel like doing it again. I’d probably pay $10 for these
customer_reviews.author: Jonny & Evelyn Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Good for Home Theater
customer_reviews.text: We're using these in our home theater to block out light when we use it during the day. These curtains do an excellent job of blocking out the light from the window near the screen. The material is thick and feels like it's good quality and the grommets slide easily on the curtain rod. I can't speak to durability at this point but they don't feel cheap. I also can't really speak to noise cancellation since that wasn't really our primary purpose but I haven't noticed any outside noise when these curtains are pulled. Bottom line for us is they block the light and feel like high quality curtains.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I am so in love with these curtains
customer_reviews.text: PERFECTION! I am so in love with these curtains. Material is thin, but not so thin that light seeps through. So this makes them pleasantly lightweight while still being able to completely block out light from the outside. They feel soft, but are not the softest curtains I’ve had. So they appear in every light to be a nice matte/semi-satin, with little to none of that “I’m cheap” shine that some of the lower-priced fabrics tend to have. They were very wrinkled when I took them out of the packaging, but it was nothing that an iron or time couldn’t take out. Color is true to the photos and quality is excellent. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Beat Blackout Curtains
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are the best I have found so far. Very affordable for the quality. They blackout light exceptionally and improve energy efficiency. As far as wrinkle free goes they are in fact significantly more wrinkle free then any others I have found but I did hit them with a steamer. What I love is how nice they feel. They aren’t stiff like any other black out curtains I have found. I ordered two sets and now I am looking to order two more but waiting for a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Adamo Davis

customer_reviews.title: Why are they called blackout when...
customer_reviews.text: I'm estatic that there was a color that matched the walls of the bedroom that I hung these up in. And they are of a great quality material, very well stitched. They work great when drawn to keep the heat from the summer sun out. Though, if they're called blackout curtains, why do they let light through? Not that I mind, I was just expecting that, no light to come through at all. But, I suppose because of the light blue color, of course a small glow of light is going to go through. What's the world coming to when everyone takes every word or line of words literally?:
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent curtains, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed curtains for a spare room that faces south and gets quite warm, especially in the summer. These room darkening curtains fit the bill perfectly. In the mid-day sun, with the curtains drawn closed the room is fairly dark, sufficient that one could take a nap and not be bothered too much by the sunlight. The color of the curtains was as advertised. They are generally hefty and don't have that cheap feel, especially for the price. This is the second time in several weeks that I purchased these curtains in a different color and for a different room and they fit quite well. I would buy them again if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Louis B.

customer_reviews.title: Best curtains
customer_reviews.text: I cannot attest if these are energy efficient or blackout curtains since I bought them for their color and texture. I purchased this same brand, in another style and loved them so much that I knew I'd have to buy them again! These are the softest, easiest to maintain curtains. They do have a little weight on them. They do not have lining on the back, if that's important to you. I just moved into a remodeled historic home and I'm still playing with looks. I have a very large wall of windows and these work well up against some shears. I ordered the color gray. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl9675

customer_reviews.title: Great room darkening curtains
customer_reviews.text: As with many reviews I will state these aren’t 100% blackout because the light will show around the edges and through pinholes in the fabric. However they are terrific in blocking most light and they are soft and easy to hang. They also cut down on the heat from direct sunlight. I bought this first pair for my street facing bedroom for privacy but ended up hanging them temporarily in my husband’s office which faces south and gets The sun most of the day - what a difference in temperature as soon as I closed the curtains. I will definitely wash them soon and update my review with those results.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine K

customer_reviews.title: Great at blocking light, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Working the night shift, I wanted some hefty curtains to block the daylight. These do the job perfectly. With the large eyelets, there is no fuss hanging these curtains. I installed them in under 3 minutes. My curtain rod has small enough end knobs that I didn't need to remove one, I just slid the rod through every eyelet and then hung it up. Material quality seems to be fine. Having these curtains for only 5 days now, I cannot make any claims as to their durability. I live on a quiet street, so I don't notice any noise cancelling effect. For my needs, these curtains do the job intended and are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Coomplete BLACKOUT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these in Olive for bedroom. Was I in for a total shock the next morning. I thought that it was early morning, it was 2 PM in the afternoon. It was complete darkness just the way I like it. I was so impressed that I ordered two more sets In another color for my living area. Upon opening I notices that the fabric was silky soft that as of Microfiber. I am really please with this purchase. Thank you NICETOWN and Amazon. Delivery was really fast even though THE WORLD is in total chaos at this moment. Very very satisfied. Oh, nicely priced!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timocee

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I finally invested in blackout curtains for my room & my kids room and now I’m kicking myself for not doing it sooner! These curtains do exactly what they are supposed to do. My kids are early risers, usually getting up when the sun comes up. Today, I was able to sleep until 9:30 because they were still in bed! I woke up not even knowing what time it was because my room was still so dark, haha! These especially made a huge difference in my room which faces the side of the house the sun rises on. These curtains are silky feeling which I wasn’t expecting, but it gives a sleek appearance. I highly highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I needed curtains for my bedroom. I went to two big-box stores, L**wes and T**rget, and was unimpressed with their selection. Plus my window is 36" wide and 44" long. At those big box stores the only lengths were 63" and 80". I loved that I saw a 45" long curtain. Perfect for my needs. Plus the colors were vastly more diverse. When the curtains arrived, I was impressed with the actual color of 'olive green' and the quality of the fabric. Everyone who has seen them up on my windows has been impressed. I highly recommend this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Baltimore

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control- different lengths in the same package
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three of these to have a coordinating set in my living room and dining room. All was going well until I hung the pair in the dining room. From the same package, I had one that was the correct length and one that was only 85 inches! Needless to say, this will not do. I would return them all, but they have already been washed and hung in the living room. Maybe if I order one more set, I will get one the proper length. Seems a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: A Huge Difference
customer_reviews.text: I returned another set of "Blackout" curtains that turned out to be light-filtering at best, so I was skeptical on these working as well. For the cost, these curtains look and feel nice, and more importantly, actually do a good job of actually blocking the light coming through. As you can see in the photo, if it weren't for the gaps on the sides it really does a great job blocking most of the light in this dark color. I'm happy with them and would get these again if you don't want to spend a fortune on curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Good Curtains
customer_reviews.text: I found these worked good for my purposes. I understood they were room darkening and not blackout. The greyish white color does a decent job of blocking the light in my kid's western facing window. I do have old, Venetian blinds behind the curtains, which obviously helps with the light control. With better blinds, I think these will be great. I washed them immediately upon arrival on a delicate setting and then hung them to dry. I can still see a few small wrinkles, but nothing that a little time won't address.
customer_reviews.author: ARRE

customer_reviews.title: Really nice curtains; using across a wide room doorway.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice curtains; they are lighter in weight than some other black-out curtains I have, which is what I wanted. I’m not truly sure how well they block out window light because I am using them across a doorway. For this purpose they are perfect. I have them on a strong “room divider” tension rod - which is why I wanted them a little lighter in weight. I would still try them on a window with full sunlight - I think they would do well. I bought the “Royal Purple” color and it is stunning! The fabric is smooth and almost silky in feel. I really do highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JeanneTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect fix for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought a shorter version of these about a year or so ago and was very pleased how well they worked for what I needed. Bought this much longer pair (95 in.) along with a tension curtain rod to block off a large dining/living room area so I could more efficiently heat the rooms where I spend most of my time. The length was just right and even though these aren't the heavier/thicker weatherized curtains you'd purchase for a window, I can tell just by sticking my hand through the gap how much warmer this room is than the other one. A perfect and relatively cheap solution for a unique problem.
customer_reviews.author: DNA

customer_reviews.title: NOT BLACKOUT
customer_reviews.text: They are room DARKENING but definitely NOT blackout. The company should remove any mention of blackout from their description of this product because it is incorrect and deceiving. You can see light coming through these curtains and your room will not be blacken-out at all. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: D. Czerwinski

customer_reviews.title: Cute blinds!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughters room to keep it darker for bed time. She already had some blinds on her windows but light still shown through them. These make her room completely dark. They are more of a lightweight fabric so if you got it in a lighter color some light might shine through but for our purpose it worked great. And her favorite color is purple so that’s a bonus. They don’t have any wrinkles which is nice and they look cute for the price. We are super happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: JandD

customer_reviews.title: This pair is not black out or termal
customer_reviews.text: I have had Nicetown items before and their quality is excellent. This pair however are not blackout or thermal insulated. I am disappointed that the description was misleading and these look great, but are not what I needed. I would exchange them, but already discarded the packaging. I needed curtains badly, so I am keeping them. The cost concerns me because these will not block the light or prevent heat and cold and I can't afford to buy more that "are" what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Janiece

customer_reviews.title: Day time sleepers, these curtains are for you!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a south facing window in her bedroom. Living in the middle of a corn field with no trees, her room gets ridiculously hot in the summer. These curtains completely block out the sunlight coming through her window. In the middle of the day, it's dark as night with these pulled shut and her room is considerably cooler. I'm going to have to order another set for my room, as my husband works 3rd shift and typically does not sleep well with the sun blasting through our bedroom window.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: BARSTOW, CA SUN APPROVED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pleased! They are 100% what they say they are! I live in Barstow, CA, We have high temp of 100°+, I bought these for a wesr facing window that gets beat by the sun 5+ hours in afternoon. These curtains have blocked out sun & light 100%. The heat radiating fro this window has been blocked by at least 80%. These are amazing curtains and I will be purchasing more for 2 other windows. They are so soft and light weight. Not the old school heavy draperies! I hope they hold up thru the Summer months.
customer_reviews.author: TOBYZ MOM

customer_reviews.title: Non-darkening room darkening drapes.
customer_reviews.text: These are not very darkening at all....waste of money, and now too troublesome to return after steaming and hanging them all. Greatly disappointed. Nowhere in the product description did I note a statement that the light colors really don't work well, so be aware....they do not.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Lush Color, Beautiful Drape Hang, Grommets are a Plus.
customer_reviews.text: They do block outside light well from neighbors' security lights at night very well. It remains to be seen how well they will hold heat from escaping through window glass during colder weather. That said, the color is vibrant, the fabric has a nice feel when in hand, they hang perfectly. Really appreciate the grommets on the top for the curtain rod. A bonus, hubby really likes how they look in his bedroom. Will have to see how they are after first washing, but if fabric care instructions are followed, I don't anticipate a problem.
customer_reviews.author: finyin

customer_reviews.title: Try a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dark grey curtains to replace a cheap blackout set that became see through after washing. After hanging them today they looked really nice and nice material. That was until I turned off the bedroom light and noticed along all the folds they were see through. Its as if they were machine folded at a way to aggressive setting. Stretching and creasing the threads. After reading some negative reviews I've noticed im not the first to notice this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Best Drapes Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best black out drapes I've ever owned! I initially ordered one set to see how well they would work in my home. (I ordered purple, for my grand daughter's room). They are GREAT! They really do keep it dark, which is so necessary during summer. They're not a plastic type drape; they do have good movement, but the important thing is they do keep the room dark. I loved them so much I ordered 2 more sets for my room. I get the full afternoon sun in my room and these drapes really do an excellent job of blocking it out. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M. Holts

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful for my nursery
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair like these but in a different color. They block out a lot of light. I bought blackout rods that curve around the window so it's almost pitch black. Love them. They help to block out heat and cold too. Not enough to lower my bill necessarily since it's only one room but it makes a difference in that room. There was not a double layer that I expected with my last pair nor did come with a tie off like my last pair but neither are a deal breaker for me. I still love them. Great quality, beautiful color, best pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: SHAME ON ME!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the negative reviews instead of the positive ones, so shame on me. These are NOT AT ALL as advertised! Thermal? Not at all the thickness of other thermal curtains I have. Black out? Absolutely not!!! False advertising at its best. Even with thick wood blinds closed underneath the curtains the room is not at all dark; more like the lighting I see on a cloudy day. More than disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Louise M Windsor

customer_reviews.title: These did exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I Fashioned a set of curtain rods using 1" steel pipe tubing and angles. Makes these curtains look good as they separate rooms in the house. They keep the warmth of the wood stove in my living area and yet still enough to keep the rest of the house warm to 64 degrees in 20 degree weather outside. They definitely blackout the area so no one can look in and see anything in the living portion of my house. These really made this winter a much warmer place.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: They do well!
customer_reviews.text: These are good curtains that do a good job of keeping light out. They're not truly blackout curtains, but when used properly they get the job done. Some tips for everyone; To make the most out of these curtains, make sure you use one of the darker colors. The darker the better for these. I personally had success with the gray color. Make sure the curtain isn't spread flat against your window. The flatter it is, the easier it will be for light to come through. Make sure they're pleated like in the pictures for the best results.
customer_reviews.author: wayne jones

customer_reviews.title: I wuldn't say backout...but definitely darkens
customer_reviews.text: I got these curtains in yellow for my living room and green for my son's room.to hopefully help with the heat. My AC would run all the time even at 80 degrees. I wouldn't say that they are blackout curtains but definitely darkens the room. The best part of these is that it does hold the heat behind the curtain which is better. Only had them up for a month, not yet sure on what kind of energy efficiency they provide. But so far I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CJsMama

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pathetic in terms of blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: I bought these curtain panels to darken my bedroom in the new house because the curtains I brought with me from my apartment were too long. After putting these up, it quickly became apparent that they were severely inadequate as "blackout" curtains. They'll make the room a bit darker, but it's more in the neighborhood of 50-70%. It's my understanding now that darker colors work better, but I expected better performance than what I got, so I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Tsukiakari

customer_reviews.title: Lighter shade of green than I thought, but I 100% recommend these curtains!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains were a slightly lighter shade of green than I had anticipated but I still like the color, so I don’t mind. They are great at blacking out the sun- the picture I shared doesn’t do it justice. It gets DARK when the curtains are closed! They did come a bit wrinkly, but once I steam them I’m sure they’ll look perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great dark out curtain
customer_reviews.text: I used to not be able to sleep longer once the same came up and there curtains have me sleeping in to where I feel guilty. Easy to take mid-day naps in the dark as well. They are a good, soft, fabric. I can't speak to the wrinkle free as I just put them up from the box so there are some wrinkles. I'm sure if they were ironed and/or washed and put up they would hold their look. I think they might even block some of the noise pollution from outside. I will buy more sets if desired in the future. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KDP

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I am one of those who need a room as dark as possible (at least at night) in order to sleep well. The townhouse complex I live in have lampposts that are on all night, one of which is pretty close to my bedroom window. I got the black curtains to block as much light as possible, and these blocked out all the light coming through. Much better than my old curtains. I have not had them up long enough to get a sense of noise cancellation or energy efficiency, but as far as the blackout effect, I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.Top Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: They definitely darken the room but wish the opening for the rod were smaller and then it would be really dark. Not sure what happened with others but my curtains are the same length and they are very much darker than our last "room darkening" curtains
customer_reviews.author: EllieA

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale and I’ve been happy with them so far. The only complaint is the grey is a little darker than expected. It’s more like graphite than a grey. Great material. It’s satin-like and does a darn good job of blocking out the light. I haven’t washed them yet but they did fine with using a steamer on them; wrinkles came right out.
customer_reviews.author: specvern03

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: It's much better blocking light than other versions of blackout curtains. But I would never consider these to be blackout. We use a double rod with cream curtains behind it and this helps with the blackout. If you want real blackout curtains, go to bed bath and beyond and touch them and you'll feel and see the kind you need. I've got real blackouts in the living room and although expensive, they're worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Ann Marie Burns

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not 84 inches long
customer_reviews.text: My curtains were definitely not 84 inches, more like 72. I compared them to store bought curtains that are 84 inches and these came a foot short. These are definitely not wrinkle free. They had so many wrinkles in them it looked really bad. Not blackout either. Light from a flashlight will shine through. Overall, not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rectems

customer_reviews.title: These curtains are everything I hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious about the quality of these curtains because of the stellar price, but I couldn't be happier with them! We needed curtains that weren't super dark in color, but blocked the light well, because I suffer from frequent migraines... I actually had one the day they arrived, so I put them up straight out of the package. They block the light SO well, and the fabric is a great texture and color. I would absolutely, 100% buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Bronnie & Matt

customer_reviews.title: I love these curtains!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these curtains! They are kind of silky to touch -I love the material! This is actually the 3rd time I have purchased these curtains. The pictures include the light blue ones so that I could show how blackout they actually are. Of course there are a couple wrinkles when you open the box but as they are hung up they are perfectly fine! I love these and won’t buy any other curtains after purchasing these!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Carter

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied, not as advertised at all.
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are not as advertised for keeping light out or noise reducing. There is no inner black layer (I bought the tan/biscotti color and we can see through it when the sun shines). The washing instructions also differ on the tag if the curtains themselves and say to hand wash not that they can be washed and tumble dried so that was also false. The only thing you can count on is the dimensions and the color unfortunately. I WOULD NOT recommend these curtains for help with light/energy for heat and-or AC/noise reduction, my generic previous curtains did just as well. If those are your reasons for buying new curtains, go with another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Quality NICETOWN Curtains
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy with these NICETOWN yellow curtains. The color is spot on. They hang beautifully~some wrinkles will fade out. Yes indeed insulated & complete black out. Quality of the material is wonderful. They came nicely folded & packaged up. 2 sets for my bedroom. Hung them yesterday & such a beautiful site this morning as the sun came through once I opened them. I’ve also purchased the same curtain but blue for my Son’s room. Very pleased with both sets for the price I paid. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Good value & light blocking
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality curtains, I used them in my dorm to block out a really bright light and they did a good job. Definitely didn’t block out everything but much better than what I had before. Two stars for wrinkle free because they came really wrinkled from how they were folded. I haven’t washed or ironed them because I didn’t have the room but I’m sure if I washed them the wrinkles would go out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Salvati

customer_reviews.title: Not black out or sound proof.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly had to reread the description because these curtains don't do anything they claim too and I honestly thought I had order the wrong ones by mistake. Beyond the curtains are a nice color i can't say anything else positive about them. They haven't lived up to any of their claims. The only reason I did not return was i moved my child to a different room of the house and I am too lazy to take the curtains down.
customer_reviews.author: ashleyashley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, light blocking panels
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of these curtains! The curtains I replaced had a backing that would stick together when washed which resulted in holes which would allow light to come thru. These do not have that which i feel will result in them lasting for a long time. They are pretty thick and feel very nice. They do not hold wrinkles and do block the light. I would recommend, in fact I am going to buy more for other rooms!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R

customer_reviews.title: Great value and work wonders
customer_reviews.text: Great deal! 2 panels in a pkt! Good quality curtains that do block out light (my window faces west and in the afternoon the sun is blinding) and keep my bedroom cool. Easy to hang and a perfect length. Heavy enough to do the job and darken room significantly. Gray color is dark and nice. I have light sensitivity at times due to allergies and these curtains help me to rest peacefully. Great bargain for quality curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Internet Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are amazing. I bought three different sets for three different rooms, and they block out do much light!! They look like regular curtains, and I didn't believe they would be very blackout, but they are. I had blackout curtains in my bedroom that were two layers with the inner white layer. I replaced them with these curtains, and the difference is stunning. The colors are gorgeous, texture is nice and soft, I didn't get any wrinkles. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Willing

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th time of purchasing different kinds of curtains for my living room window which is very wide. I feel like we live in a fish bowl at times. These curtains are the keepers. They do not have the white lining that black out curtains have, but they do block 95% of the light. I purchased brown. You can not see the tv screen through them at night from outside. They easily slide on the curtain rod to open/close which is a huge plus. These will be my "go to" when I need curtains for my other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Angeles E Oakes

customer_reviews.title: No Noise cancelling ability
customer_reviews.text: Good curtains for the price and for blocking out light. Forget any noise cancelling ability. No notable difference noticed when installed over a window that had central A/C unit about 6 feet from it outside. I saw answers to questions for this curtain regarding noise reduction and others saying it reduces noise in some of the reviews, but for me I saw no noticeable difference in noise. For sure very good at blocking light though
customer_reviews.author: Zappem

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Curtains
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these curtains. In the picture, these curtains are on the left, my old ones are on the right. Excellent quality and price, very good blackout capabilities. The stitching is great too, and the color goes with my light wood linoleum floor. The hook loops at the top are smooth and look great. As it says in the description, this is about 90% blackout. But true 100% blackout curtains weight twice as much and bend regular rods. These are regular curtain weight and work fantastically. They are an unbelievably good deal and I'll definitely be buying more someday when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: TheT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, lovely color and DARK
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really care if they were black out or not, I had sheers to begin with and that didn't allow any privacy. This is for a ground level office room, window in back yard with view of neighbor's house. Put them up in the afternoon and they made the room pitch black. Nice thick material, I got the royal purple, and it's very nice. 45" fits perfectly on my window still allowing access to the ledge to put stuff on. Will buy more of these for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: The Senator

customer_reviews.title: Curtains
customer_reviews.text: These are great curtains & at a great price for the value you get. They are a very nice weight & well made. Darken the room nicely, not total black out, but dims a lot. Also makes the room quieter. My only concern is getting the fold wrinkles out. I washed, dried and steam ironed them before hanging them & still was not able to get all the fold lines out. The won't wrinkle much, but hope the fold lines hang out eventually. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: rich colors, luxurious feel for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!! The color is so rich and the feel of the fabric is very luxurious at an affordable price. This product makes my windows look amazing. I can't speak to the energy efficiency yet as winter is just setting in. I can say so far I have noticed a drastic difference in the room temperature especially by the window. The room maintains it's cozy feel with them shut especially at night. As for the wrinkles, the only creases are those present from packaging. After I steamed them, I presume they will stay wrinkle free.
customer_reviews.author: Durga Prasad Sahu Teli

customer_reviews.title: NOT TRIPLE LAYERED!!
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. The product description stated and pictured a sound damping triple layered cutain. NOT even close. Its a simple poorly constructed curtain. Not a good way to do business but you get what you pay for, My issue is that I based my purchase on recommendations ,stars and customer experience. None described this product . Lead me to think this is all a selling scam with Amazon just not doing due diligence. I've had mainly good experiences but situations like this make good ones non existing. I'm returning asap!
customer_reviews.author: Frank White

customer_reviews.title: Useful for slight noise blocking and nice fabric for light blocking.
customer_reviews.text: I used these curtains to block noise from the lower level of my house to the upper level. I put a shorter pair right where a door could be and a longer pair up higher on the steps. The noise blocking is minimal but they help. I wanted them for noise blocking and privacy and they are a good value. They provide some privacy when people are on the lower level and some noise blocking from the TV. I think they were a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WeaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Drapes - Great Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: We bought the turquoise drapes as accent curtains for 2 narrow windows in our living room. They went perfectly with the DriftAway Blossom drapes that we used for the slider and large window. The wrinkles came out with a steamer and the drapes hang beautifully. Although we don't pull them closed very often, when we do I notice that the noise is less and they block the wind and sun. We also bought these in other colors for our condo and they are also wonderful drapes.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy 5 Star Curtains
customer_reviews.text: I got a dark red pair of these for an office I was putting together and they perform better than anything I could find at my local Lowes/Walmart. Also these are legitimately soft and deceptive when you first feel them you would'nt imagine they would function well as blackout curtains but they are quite amazing. As with anything wash and dry before you hang up the first time, mine came out smooth as eggs. I'm planning on buying some more to be a matching set for my bedroom now.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good curtains. True to the white color as advertised, seams and measurements are great, and they are really easy to put on any size rod. I bought the white and I would say they are 50% blackout which is what they advertise. Yes, they are wrinkled but they come in folded and in nice packaging. Why would they not be wrinkled? That's why we have irons. Will purchase again if I need a matching set.
customer_reviews.author: NJA

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These far surpassed my expectations. They are sooo soft and luxurious feeling- think upscale hotel curtains. I got the color “grayish white” and it does a very good job at blocking light. I haven’t noticed any difference in noise but for the price these are the nicest curtains I’ve ever owned. Also a tip, whenever you measure your window width make sure you at least double the inches and order enough panels to cover that so you get the pretty bunched up effect like the photo !
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: NOT as described
customer_reviews.text: This is neither blackout nor thermal. I purchased the dark grey and it’s just that : darker color curtains. It doesn’t serve the purpose I bought it for. It doesn’t block the light or the heat or the cold. I’m going to buy an extra set so I don’t stretch the curtains much. That’s because I threw away the packaging and hung the panels and can no longer return. I’m not sure why there are so many good reviews but I shouldn’t have purchased this. I like to make an informed decision before I buy but the good reviews were misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Microfiber and seams not well sewn
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize they are that awful microfiber and stick to my fingers when I touch them, plus extremely wrinkled, additionally the seams at the top are not sewn well and pucker in places - also the bottom hem puckers in places. I will be contacting Amazon about sending them back. The color was as expected - maybe just a little darker than the picture and the length was what I needed - not enough redeeming qualities to be happy with them. For anyone expecting them to have a room darkening liner they don't.
customer_reviews.author: DeEtta L.

customer_reviews.title: It pays to buy “used”
customer_reviews.text: When I buy from Amazon Warehouse, I always opt for “like new”. This is the first time I took a chance on “good” condition because the price was unbeatable and I figured if they were horrible, I wasn’t losing a lot of money. Aside from being wadded up & a bit wrinkly, they were totally undamaged & perfect! I washed in cold on gentle & hung to dry. Although they were still a bit wrinkly, I think they are heavy enough that the wrinkles will come out in time. I’m thrilled! Best $20 I’ve spent on Amazon in a while!
customer_reviews.author: ThereSheGoesShoppingAgain

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: New neighbors leave the front lights on all night because they work odd hours, and our bedroom had too much light coming in. These curtains really do block out all the light, 100%. The only problem I had was that I overslept the first 3 mornings until I realized that the morning sun wasn't getting in to wake me. Buy these; they're great for completely darkening a room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I got these thinking they were different. They are beautiful curtains and they feel nice and block out light but they were more like a red red when I thought it was a burgundy color. These reminded me of like stage curtains. Not the look I was aiming for. But they are very nicely put together not at all cheaply made. If they had been the color and texture I was looking for then forsure I would have kept them. But since they are not I am going to be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Josefina De La Torre

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great
customer_reviews.text: The curtains look great. They have been hanging for about a week and still have the main creases from the packaging, but I personally have never bought curtains that didn't hold those creases for a long time. The blackout effect is great and they do a stellar job keeping the heat out of the room too on hot, bright days. I would definitely buy these again when I need new curtains for another room.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not especially sound-blocking
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! Despite being white, they blockout a good amount of light. I was a little disappointed that they didn’t block out more sound, but overall I love them so much that it doesn’t matter too much.
customer_reviews.author: TiaM

customer_reviews.title: False advertising in every way
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely not black out curtains in any way shape or form. Even when the sun is setting light still comes through. Do not buy these expecting black out curtains or even noise reduction. The only thing it will change is the light in your room's color. My bedroom is bright as hell it's just blue now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!  Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleasantly surprised. These are great. I have another pair of blackout curtains I bought a frw years ago that I thought were pretty good, and they are. You can barely see light though them, but these!!! Wow!!! I think I would only be able to see light through them at all IF the sun was directly shining on them. They do an amazing job. I also love that there is NO SMELL right out of the package. So many drapes or curtains have been treated and stink when they come out of the plastic. These do not. I will definitely purchase more in the future. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lucetta

customer_reviews.title: Might need 1 pack than you think
customer_reviews.text: They do a fairly good job. My window is about 8 ft wide, luckily I ordered two pairs of these because even though they are 5ft wide some of that is taken up by putting it on a curtain rod, I ended up needing 3 of the 4 panels to properly cover my window. The photo might be a little misleading, the curtains work great, I probably need to adjust the positioning of the curtain rod a bit, but it's dark enough to sleep now.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Length isn't accurate, panels can be 1/2 inch off of one another.
customer_reviews.text: The material seems to be of good quality but after hanging them up I saw the problem with these curtains, out of the 8 panels I ordered 4 were about 1/2 inch to short which looked pretty bad, also the bottom corners flare upwards but we will deal with them because these are the only ones we could find in the size we needed, but I couldn't recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great black out and surprisingly does dampen noise
customer_reviews.text: I bought these curtains for my bedroom which has windows about 25 ft from a semi-busy residential street. So, streetlights and lots of cars. These curtains are thick but not very heavy. I have another curtain with a design over them that matches my but they could be used without anything. Light is blocked except very minimal coming out of the top. I am most pleased with the noise dampening ability. Prior to them I could hear EVERY vehicle that went by. Now it's just minimal routine environment noise!
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains, very happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to give my daughter a private spot under her loft bed. I wasn't expecting much, just needed something the right length. I am very impressed with these! They are thick, soft, and far less wrinkled than the blackout curtains on our windows, and they do a good job of blocking light. I would definitely buy them again, very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy family of 6

customer_reviews.title: Quality excellent
customer_reviews.text: Received my new curtains today. They were purchased to pull my room together for the holidays. They were great feeling and heavy for being polyester. I'm very impressed with the workmanship on them. From package to window the creases from packaging fell right out. They do block the outside light nicely too. All in all I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sessa

customer_reviews.title: Not completely blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't call them "black out" curtains but more of a roomdarkening curtain. During the day you can definitely see the light through them and I have room darkening blinds behind them. These are not lined and I believe that's where the problem is. I have some for my son's room that are lined and they are completely black during the day. These do darken it enough that my daughter can take her nap. I'm hoping they help with keeping out heat during the summer also but won't know until we get there. Overall for the price they are a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: BlazerMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains.
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice, I regret that they are made in China but I have to buy what I can afford and needed them quick. The material is super soft and no plastic backing that will melt in the dryer. Very efficient at blocking out the light. I took them out of the package and threw into the dryer with a wet towel and dryer balls for 10 minutes and all the creases from packaging were gone. Will most definitely be buying a pair for my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: goatlady2

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY NOT BLACK OUT!
customer_reviews.text: Room darkening? Maybe . Black out? No way. See picture with light streaming through the two inch blinds behind the fabric. (color cappuccino). Triple weave technology with black thread in the middle? Mumbo jumbo marketing BS in my book. Looks and feels like a single layer of polyester. If you're not looking for black out and want inexpensive polyester drapery panels then this is probably a good bet. Unfortunately for me I wanted true black out.
customer_reviews.author: Project Master

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd set of these curtains I have bought. I am very surprised and pleased with the quality of the material and the overall look of the curtains especially for the price. The color is exactly as it is in the photos. I’ve bought grey and green so far and they’re both beautiful colors. I will be buying more to replace all my curtains in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: They showed up quickly, and in very easy-to-open packaging. The mounting holes have metal rings around them for easy sliding back and forth along the curtain rod. We really wanted blackout curtains for the bedroom and have used them for a week now. The room stays dark in the mornings which is excellent for me as I go into work in the early afternoon and appreciate a dark room to sleep in. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Whitten

customer_reviews.title: Perfect curtains
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter’s room and I love them! I think they are super cute and look so perfect with her room! They are wrinkle free and very light weight. They are blackout but not completely, it’s probably like a level 1 or 2 of blackout, but it’s perfect because it’s dark enough to not wake up to a bright room but also when she wakes up the room isn’t super dark.
customer_reviews.author: Yas

customer_reviews.title: Blocks most light
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these before & loves them. They're soft, drape nicely & wash well. They block most light except what escapes from the side & top. Not sure about the thermal properties. Returned blackout drapes that were light filtering & reordered these. A little wrinkled coming out of the pkg but not bad. Quick wash or steam refresh in the dryer fixes that. Very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: KTLiles

customer_reviews.title: Giving these 4 stars because I love the quality and have purchased from this company before
customer_reviews.text: Giving these 4 stars because I love the quality and have purchased from this company before. However, the color was a little more muted than I thought it would be based upon the description and photos in the listing. It seemed (to me) to be a little more of a Lilac color, which is still very pretty but not what I wanted. Quality is great. Color is on both side of curtain and are black out curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not noise cancelling at all. Should not be allowed to label them this.
customer_reviews.text: They're cheap and arrived quickly. Had low expectations, which were met. I got a set that had absolutely zero impact on the noise. I got the long ones as suggested and have them very close to the window, as suggested. Does not matter. These were thin enough to let light through so i got another set to double up, hoping for a difference in noise getting through. There was no improvement even with the second set. When doubled up they do not let light through, so i suppose i got something out of my $80...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for coordinating colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my "cool" room. They are the softest, best curtains I have ever bought. The fabric is awesome. They don't have a rubber lining like other black-out curtains. But, they are so thick and luscious that they don't need it. They are high quality curtains. I am so tempted to buy a set of LONG ones just to utilize the fabric for table cloths and small window curtains. I Will buy more sets to replace the 15 year old home-made ones I put in my room. Pictures to come after I get the wall decals up.
customer_reviews.author: oribhabor

customer_reviews.title: Durable and actually blocks out light
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked that these curtains turned out so nice. They were really cheap compared to ones I’ve seen at Wal-mart and other stores. It keeps out a lot of light and they actually seem to be of decent quality. Of course they can’t stand up to my cats ripping them to pieces, but no curtain can. It’s ok they were cheap enough I’ll buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Hockenberry

customer_reviews.title: They really do block outside view.
customer_reviews.text: Before we got these curtains, we rocked some homemade burlap, tea dyed canvas. Artfully ringed with nickel plated hardware, they adorned our living room windows for a couple years. However to my dismay and our neighbors delight. Our night time activities were visible with light. At last we purchased these light hindering curtains, and now our key parties risk little incursion. Be it snooping neighbors and passerby with cel phones who just can't seem to stop posting unsolicited content online! Thank you Nicetown. These curtains are everything our perverse lifestyle ever needed!
customer_reviews.author: Cody R Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Bad batch
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happned with this set of curtains but they are no good! I have 8 other sets of curtains from this brand and seller and ALL of those are top quality however, these are sewn crooked, and the material is super thin and they are quite wrinkled!So dissaponted in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Ritta

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for 2 panels and price! Color choice effects blackout though.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 packages of the white gray color and we love them. The fabric is really nice and soft, but obviously wrinkly from the package. Going off other reviews we knew they would not be 100% blackout curtains, however they definitely make the room darker and seems to keep it cooler. We mainly bought these to block the glare off of the television and it does its job. For the price and getting 2 panels per package it’s a great buy, but with the lighter color choice do not expect black out. We also bought a red pair and they are almost 100% blackout. I definitely recommend and will be purchasing more colors for other rooms
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ostdiek

customer_reviews.title: Look great! Sturdy and hang nicely!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely luv these drapes! They keep there shape, they are heavy but not too heavy, they hang well and look great! Some wrinkles when I got them and the static cling was so strong. I threw them in the dryer on low for about 15 minutes with a dryer sheet. Amazing, wrinkle free and static cling was gone! Definitely worth the money! Would recommend them if your looking for drapes!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Harm

customer_reviews.title: Thinner weight than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I've got these installed over mini blinds and they do add another layer of darkening. And diffuse the remaining light better than mini blinds themselves. They do not have a liner to stop all light. Fabric weight is maybe medium. I ordered curtains that are wider than my windows and I'm using the metal spring clips (for office documents) to keep them permanently closed to help minimize any remaining light or sound transmission. It's good enough for my temporary application.
customer_reviews.author: internet user

product_meta.title: NICETOWN Blackout Curtains Panels for Bedroom - 3 Pass Microfiber Noise Reducing Thermal Insulated Solid Ring Top Blackout Window Drapes (2 Panels, 52 x 84 Inch, Gray)
feature_bullets: ELEGANT DESIGN: 2 panels per package. Each Blackout Curtain measures 52" wide x 84" long. The design of silver grommet (1.6-inch inner diameter) creates casual elegance for your house, which makes the curtains easy to install and slide.

AMAZING MATERIAL: Super heavy and soft Blackout Curtain Panels are very upmarket. Besides, 85%-99% light blocking, thermal insulated, soundproof, Fade-resistant, energy-efficient. Thread trimmed and wrinkle-free, both sides are the same color.

WISE BUDGET: Protect your furniture and floor exposed to the sun, while still helping you save money on heating and cooling your home. Privacy protection. The greatest benefit is to bring you a good night's sleep, making you full of energy every day.

WIDE COMPATIBILITY: Don't bother looking for sheer curtains to match, choosing different styles of voile curtains with white color in the NICETOWN store. Such curtain sets provide a more permanent harmonious window dressing, making your home lively.

EASY CARE: Good quality finishing will withstand years of use. Machine washable and Wash the water temperature below 86℉. Mild detergent no bleaching. Low-temperature ironing. Don’t use sharp things scratching curtains.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars14,183 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
